describe: The Philippines is an archipelago in Southeast Asia consisting of over 7,000 islands. Known for its rich biodiversity, vibrant culture, and historical landmarks, it is a popular tourist destination. The country is famous for its beautiful beaches, lush landscapes, and warm hospitality.

cities.name: üèù Manila
cities.geographical_location: Located on the eastern shore of Manila Bay on the island of Luzon.
cities.climate: Tropical savanna climate with a distinct dry season from December to May and a wet season from June to November.

cities.name: üèù Cebu City
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the eastern shore of Cebu Island in the Central Visayas region.
cities.climate: Tropical climate with a wet season from June to December and a dry season from January to May.

cities.name: üèù Davao City
cities.geographical_location: Located in the southeastern part of Mindanao Island.
cities.climate: Tropical rainforest climate with no pronounced dry season.

cities.name: üèù Boracay
cities.geographical_location: A small island in the Western Visayas region, located approximately 315 km south of Manila.
cities.climate: Tropical climate with a wet season from June to October and a dry season from November to May.
